name: XWUI Checkbox Component
description: Checkbox input component with label support and indeterminate state. Supports various sizes, colors, and disabled states. Useful for forms and selection interfaces.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

indeterminate.description: Whether the checkbox is in indeterminate state

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the checkbox

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

label.description: Label text displayed next to the checkbox

description.description: Additional description text below the label

name.description: HTML name attribute for form submission

id.description: HTML id attribute for the checkbox
